title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Katrina Pierson | 6/10/21
description:
Bill O’Reilly joins a day early to discuss his upcoming history tour with former President Trump, along with the controversy surrounding Vice President Kamala Harris’ handling of the immigration crisis. A New York mom’s powerful rebuke of her school board has gone viral. 2016 Trump campaign spokesperson Katrina Pierson breaks down the media’s double standard on Hunter Biden.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
